Replace.Text: Nile Domain-Civet
Divine Realm Nero
Bastet
I'm here!
Shadow's Claw

After creating a capital, immediately gain Bastet and Kuniichi, the city does not generate war fatigue, upgrading units does not end their turns, all units ignore terrain, [ICON_Movement] movement penalty and control zone for crossing rivers. Can only be discovered by anti-stealth units unless adjacent to a unit
Hey, do you want to know why I joined Kolge? Maybe it’s because my grades are pretty good? Actually, I didn’t expect the exam to go so smoothly. - Bastet
Trainee Agent
A civilization that likes to clear out barbarian villages
I agree...well...is that all?
What are you talking about..haha~
The Eye of the Deep Space needs companions like you, would you like to join us?
If you need any help, please contact us as soon as possible.
All right...
Uhhhh——? Attack us?
Before you can explain what unforgivable crime you committed, I have to kill you first. Don't worry, it won't hurt.
Messenger? Are you a VIP? Can you let me know before you come next time?
No, no outsiders allowed
Kolge has sent someone to take charge of diplomacy. I hope you can accept him.
Ah, are you hiding something from yourself?
Although I haven't found out your background yet, your behavior is no different from that of a heinous criminal!
Wow, you can still see humans in a place like this, you are not hiding from the public, are you?
I'm assisting with some things at the Deep Space Eye right now. Would you like to come and take a look at the Deep Space Eye building?
OK, I'm free.
Let's exchange positions so that we can contact each other later.
NULL
Kolge's agents reported to me that you deployed all your troops to my border. This is a very dangerous situation.
Yeah, that's good.
I think you should find another way to establish a base.
I will regard this as a provocative act and you will bear the consequences at your own risk.
Although I'm a novice, I still caught your informant.
It seems you still don't give up, then come on
Why are your people so fond of heresy? Can you get them to leave Ain Sofi?
Since you don't do it, don't blame me for being rude.
Go...retreat...
Well, thank you very much
Eh? Your bid is not enough?
Eh? Your bid is not enough?
Thank you very much for helping Kolge prevent a major crime. I have arrested all the criminals. Thank you for your hard work~
Bastet greatly appreciated your action in clearing the barbarian village.
